snippet.title: 2013 NBA All-Star Game halftime show: Alicia Keys set to perform
snippet.description:
2013 NBA All-Star Game halftime show: Alicia Keys set to perform by David Cassilo on Feb 17 2013, 12:00p
The New York native performed the national anthem two weeks ago at the Super Bowl.

snippet.title: Tony Parker Could Miss Olympics With Eye Injury, Sues Nightclub For $20 Million
snippet.description:
Tony Parker Could Miss Olympics With Eye Injury, Sues Nightclub For $20 Million by Matt Watson on Jun 24 2012, 1:13p
Tony Parker may be unable to represent France in the Olympics due to an eye injury suffered earlier this month during a nightclub brawl between musician Chris Brown and members of rapper Drake's...

snippet.title: It's The Heat's Turn To Look Unstoppable
snippet.description:
It's The Heat's Turn To Look Unstoppable by Bomani Jones on Jun 18 2012, 9:47a
Remember when the Thunder looked unbeatable in the NBA Finals ... after one game? One more loss for Oklahoma City, and the Heat will be impossible to beat. That, and much more in the Monday Morning...
